title: Number of visitors to the World War II Memorial in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Number of visitors in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of visitors in millions is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Number of visitors in millions, about 5.07 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Number of visitors in millions about 4.23 was reached at Year 2014
